testsuite.name: test.TC9_File_A_Leave
testsuite.system-out: Clicked the "I understand the risks, take me there anyway" link. Entered the username Entered the password Clicked the Login button Successfully logged in using ramon.tupaz credentials. Successfully verified that the Remarks column is empty Successfully verified the existence of File A Leave action User clicked the File A Leave button User selected Banked General Leave from the Leave Type dropdown User selected Emergency Leave from the Reasons dropdown User entered This is a statement for the Comment Text Box in the Comment text box User entered 1234567890 in the Contact Number field User clicked the Submit button Successfully verified leave was submitted.
